short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple menu for quick access to SFMC tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SFMC Menu Chrome Extension

Simplify your Salesforce Marketing Cloud (SFMC) experience with the SFMC Menu Chrome Extension! This powerful and user-friendly tool provides a streamlined way to navigate to various pages on the Salesforce Marketing Cloud platform, helping you save time and boost productivity directly from a user-friendly menu.

How It Works:
* Install the extension and open the SFMC Menu popup.
* Use the Settings button to customise your menu:
* Toggle visibility of menu items with checkboxes.
* Reorder the menu
* Save your settings automatically for a personalised experience every time.
* Click on any menu item to jump directly to the corresponding SFMC page.
* This extension is perfect for Salesforce Marketing Cloud users who want to streamline their workflow, reduce clutter, and navigate SFMC with ease.

Download the SFMC Menu Chrome Extension now and take control of your SFMC navigation experience!
